name: CTParagraphStyleSpecifier
desc: Constants used to query and modify a paragraph style object.

items.name: case firstLineHeadIndent
items.desc: The distance, in points, from the leading margin of a frame to the beginning of the paragraph's first line.

items.name: case headIndent
items.desc: The distance, in points, from the leading margin of a text container to the beginning of lines other than the first.

items.name: case tailIndent
items.desc: The distance, in points, from the margin of a frame to the end of lines.

items.name: case tabStops
items.desc: The text tab objects, sorted by location, that define the tab stops for the paragraph style.

items.name: case lineBreakMode
items.desc: The mode that should be used to break lines when laying out the paragraph's text.

items.name: case maximumLineHeight
items.desc: The maximum height that any line in the frame will occupy, regardless of the font size or size of any attached graphic.

items.name: case minimumLineHeight
items.desc: The minimum height that any line in the frame will occupy, regardless of the font size or size of any attached graphic.

items.name: case paragraphSpacing
items.desc: The space added at the end of the paragraph to separate it from the following paragraph.

items.name: case paragraphSpacingBefore
items.desc: The distance between the paragraph's top and the beginning of its text content.

items.name: case baseWritingDirection
items.desc: The base writing direction of the lines.

items.name: case maximumLineSpacing
items.desc: The maximum space in points between lines within the paragraph (commonly known as leading).

items.name: case minimumLineSpacing
items.desc: The minimum space in points between lines within the paragraph (commonly known as leading).

items.name: case lineSpacingAdjustment
items.desc: The space in points added between lines within the paragraph (commonly known as leading).

items.name: case lineBoundsOptions
items.desc: Options that control the alignment of the line edges with the leading and trailing margins.
